name: skirmish
body:
### Welcome to skirmish.
Skirmish is a single-player text-based adventure game in the vein of CircleMUD. 

### Coming soon:
Quests, combat, equipment, and so much more!

Skirmish is MIT-licensed, and is copyright 2016 by Andy Mikula (@andy-j).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
